org.mokai.persist.jdbc
Interface SqlEngine

All Known Implementing Classes:
DerbyEngine, MySqlEngine
public interface SqlEngine

Allows the initialization and custom dialect of a database. An implementation is required for each supported database.

Author:
German Escobar

Method Detail

init

void init()
          throws Exception
Initializes the database. Should execute only if isInitialized() is false.

Throws:
Exception

isInitialized

boolean isInitialized()
Returns:
true if the init method has already been called, false otherwise.

addLimitToQuery

String addLimitToQuery(String query,
                       int offset,
                       int numRows)
Adds the limit clause to a query.

Parameters:
query - the query to which we are adding the limit clause.
offset - the offset from which we are showing the records.
numRows - the number of rows to show from offset.
Returns:
the query with the limit clause added.
